refnamediv.refpurpose: Should equations output for processing by TeX be surrounded by math mode delimiters?

refsection.para: For compatibility with DSSSL based DBTeXMath from Allin Cottrell you should set this parameter to 0.

warning.para: This feature is useful for print/PDF output only if you use the obsolete and now unsupported PassiveTeX XSL-FO engine.

refsection.para: You can also use the dbtex delims processing instruction to control whether delimiters are output.
